metadata.ground_truth: Both Curry Prince and Rajmahal have nice views. Would you like to know something more about either of them?
metadata.predicted: The view at the Curry Prince restaurant is said to be a bit mediocre, but the view at the Rajmahal restaurant is said to be nice.

conversation.content: I'd looking for a good restaurant on the east side.  I'd prefer the moderate price range, if possible.
Would you prefer Indian or Italian food?
There is curry prince, and rajmahal, would either of those work for you?
I would a place with a nice view.  Do any of these places have that?
The view at the Curry Prince restaurant is said to be a bit mediocre, but the view at the Rajmahal restaurant is said to be nice.

Thanks for sticking with it — going back to what we discussed, Rajmahal is the stronger pick for a nice view. Since Curry Prince’s view is reportedly mediocre, Rajmahal fits your preference. I can check availability at Rajmahal for your date. bye <END>
